description: Returns a list of snapshot copy configurations.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If nextToken is returned, there are more results available. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. Make the call again using the returned token to retrieve the next page.

nested_items.name: snapshotCopyConfigurations
nested_items.description: All of the returned snapshot copy configurations.

nested_items.name: destinationKmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The ID of the KMS key to use to encrypt your snapshots in the destination Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: destinationRegion
nested_items.description: The destination Amazon Web Services Region to copy snapshots to.

nested_items.name: namespaceName
nested_items.description: The name of the namespace to copy snapshots from in the source Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: snapshotCopyConfigurationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the snapshot copy configuration object.

nested_items.name: snapshotCopyConfigurationId
nested_items.description: The ID of the snapshot copy configuration object.

nested_items.name: snapshotRetentionPeriod
nested_items.description: The retention period of snapshots that are copied to the destination Amazon Web Services Region.
